hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“We, the family of Muhammad (ﷺ), would stay for a month during which no fire would be lit (for cooking) and we had only dates and water.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the family of Muhammad (ﷺ)
